phrases: I had lost my way during my journey.
Only my soul was wandering, while I stood still.
But right now, I am walking to a distant place.
That is right, ever since I met you on this road.
The travellers witnessed the song, the forbidden song,
And I became attached to it as I heard it alone with you.
If the world I saw in my dreams exists somewhere,
Let us go search for it, beyond the winds.
Whether it is a freezing dawn,
A dry midday,
A shivering night,
or the ends of the Earth, let us go and see it.
Wolf and New Journey
I thought that we would have a touching reunion,
but you look terrible.
They betrayed us.
This was all I could protect.
Geez, you are such a fool.
Your face is swollen from being hit,
you are covered with mud, and even your wrist is burnt.
And even with your foolish state,
you protected my clothes with such devotion so they would not become wet.
You are an unbelievable softy!
You know...
I might have to kill people.
Horo...
I just wanted to hasten our plans,
so that you and I could return to traveling without cares.
That is why I did not fight with those arrogant youngsters,
and settled it by mature means.
Do not tell me... right before them, you...
Do not say it!
That is fine, it was something that I decided on.
But this is my repayment?
With your pathetic state,
I just cannot stand it!
Let us go immediately to that Remerio man's place,
and make him pay.
H-Hold on, first we have to deal with Liebert!
And as fast as possible!
If you have a satisfying reason, then tell me.
They are planning to kill Nora.
She has her partner, I am sure she will be fine.
She does, but there is a limit to how reckless they can be!
If it were you...
What if it were me?
If it were you, you could take care of a hundred armed men with ease!
But I would be a wolf during that time!
And that girl is a shepherd!
Even so, could you do it?
I cannot just abandon them, knowing that they will be killed unjustly!
Of course I will pay you back.
How?
If you can save Nora's life, I will pay you back to the best of your expectations.
Please.
I only have you!
Horo!
Taking off my clothes would be better, right?
It will be troublesome to prepare new ones for me.
So you will do it?
Under one condition, though.
No matter who it may be,
I cannot guarantee their lives if they test my temper.
Will you acknowledge that?
That is fine.
But I believe you.
You have become a smooth talker.
Geez...
What a troublesome traveling companion.
Do you have anything to say?
Yeah.
You have a magnificent tail!
That was somewhat monotonous, but very well.
Now, could you close your eyes for a bit?
Come, get on.
You do not need to mind me.
If you fall, you will be riding in my mouth!
I will not let go even if I die-
Hey.
What is it?
I, um...
I actually really hate shepherds!
Hearing that relieves me.
Whether this job fails or succeeds, Nora will stop being a shepherd.
I have decided on what I want!
What is it?
The best honey peaches there are!
Be gentle the-
Eh?
Lawrence and Horo have?
By the time we found them, we could barely tell it was them.
The two were piled together.
Nora!
S-Sorry.
I am fine.
No, it is really unfortunate.
We survivors should continue and do our best.
Are you ready?
Yeah.
They are right over there.
We caught up to them already?
Yes.
I do not see anyone, though.
They are quite well armed.
There are about twenty of them.
That many?
Anyway, just leave it to me!
Once I jump over them, I will back away.
When I do, you jump off.
Do not get close!
Protect the shepherd and sheep!
Nora!
So you are safe!
Take the shepherd and run away!
Run!
Shepherd!
Protect me!
Enik.
Oh no...
Horo is serious!
I promise you three hundred Rumione if you protect me!
No!
Enik!
Enik!
Wait!
Nora!
Um...
Yes?
You are not... a ghost, right?
I will let you in on the secret.
That wolf is Horo.
Horo?
You did not kill him?
I did think of swallowing him, though.
It seems that my stomach likes gold.
I see.
This is it.
You bastards!
Do not think you will get away after doing-
Good day, Mr. Liebert.
I was not the one who betrayed you!
Please believe me!
This wolf is an agent of the almighty God.
Lying will not do you any good.
The payment you guys demanded was too much!
If we had gone with the original plan, we would pay off our debt, but there would not be any profit!
That is why Remerio told me to do something about it!
You understand, do not you?
You and I are merch-
Do not treat me like you!
Sorry for the commotion.
It is okay.
In brief, Remerio has betrayed us.
I heard they were planning to kill you, too.
I had a vague idea they would, but...
Now then, should we take the gold and run away?
Let us see...
Even without smuggling, the gold Liebert bought amounts to 400 Rumione.
If we ignore the Remerio Company who betrayed us, we can live well-off for quite a while.
However, if it were not for the Remerio Company's investments,
we would not have obtained this gold.
And if we take away this gold, they will no doubt go bankrupt and be thrown into the streets.
And so...
So, we will...
Horo!
We have to live after this!
If we get revenge because we were betrayed, more vengeance will be waiting for us!
Then I will...
Do not say that you will bite everyone to death who was involved!
Using money stained with a person's blood to buy bread is a terrible feeling.
There are many ways to settle things!
Do not you want to make the choice that will lead us to tomorrow?!
Horo, if you were not there, I would probably be freezing to death now.
I am also very thankful that you listened to my request.
However!
Enough, do whatever pleases you.
Geez, my companion is so troublesome.
Sorry for the wait.
Eh?
Ah, yes.
Just as I mentioned, this is my proposal.
Now, then...
What?
Could you tell me how it really is?
Whatever do you mean?
Do not play dumb, you are not that virtuous of a person.
Please decide whether we take this gold into Rubinheigen or not, Nora.
I do not mind splitting half of what we took.
Okay.
However, if we bring it and rely on some connections, we can make ten times the amount, or six thousand Rumione.
S-Six thousand?
And with that much, we can also save the Remerio Company.
It cannot be helped if you saw through me.
There was not enough gold.
It will be impossible to get six hundred Rumione with that amount.
Only about one hundred at best.
After splitting half the share, you would only be able to pay off your debt, and that would be it.
So that means we will not see any profits unless we smuggle.
In reality, they were under the pressure of necessity.
They were only able to obtain a tenth of what they planned, one hundred Rumione, from scrounging up what they could.
They would smuggle the gold they bought and thought it would be okay if they could get one thousand Rumione.
So they knew they did not have enough to pay us to keep quiet from the start.
That is probably why they agreed to the proposal we brought.
Well, I understand their situation, but...
Is there something else?
You did not need to say it to the little girl like that.
Did I put on too much of an act?
Is it something you need to burden yourself with?
There is more that I want to say, but...
Get on.
You have to go to Remerio, right?
Are not you going?
Business dealings have nothing to do with me.
Are you angry?
If you do not pay attention, you will fly off!
F-Five hundred?
That is right.
In the event that we succeed in smuggling,
will you buy the gold at five hundred Rumione?
T-That is impossible.
There is no way we could do that now.
Of course, you will not have to pay it in full.
You just need to write a promissory note and return it to us in small payments over ten years.
But five hundred is just too-
You have made many fine acquaintances in this town with loading spots.
Five hundred Rumione over ten years will be nothing.
W-What are you...
I heard about this from Liebert.
Rather than taking flight in the night with these little assets,
accepting our demands and rebuilding your store is more advantageous, of course.
Send your debts to the Rowen Trading Guild.
To the Guild?
You may betray me, but if you betray the Trading Guild, that will be the end of your days as a merchant.
I thought I would not be able to see you anymore!
Damn you for scaring me, you bastard!
I-I cannot breathe...
Geez, you are such an eccentric son!
Now you can cut your ties with Remerio and turn their debt into money after ten years.
Just what did you do?
I just traded some gold.
I cannot really say it, though.
Well then, I will buy thirty for now.
If your dealings succeed, I will buy another hundred.
A hundred?
I am happy, so it is a big bonus!
Thank you.
If I have that much, I might just joke around, say my apologies, and then pay off my debt.
You have become a great merchant.
All right, once we are done with the audit, we are going to drink until we drop!
Eh, well...
My companion...
You are late.
Sorry.
So, what did you want to ask?
I have two questions.
Two?
First...
Just how much do you trust that girl?
If she runs away with the gold now, we can still chase her.
Anticipating that, I do not trust Nora enough to hand her the gold.
Well, I thought it would be something like that.
What is the other question?
I will answer whatever you ask.
I owe you a lot this time.
I want to...
Get some air.
Do you... remember?
When I was confronting the dog and the girl, whose name did you call?
Blood got to my head, so I could not hear.
But I am sure you called one of our names.
Does it worry you?
Not really.
It does not worry me that much.
I called your name.
You are lying, are not you?
Yeah, I lied.
The truth is that I do not remember.
However!
However?
In that situation, I am sure I called your name.
A conflict was about to begin, after all.
I am sure I unconsciously chose to call your name.
That is because...
W-Wait!
Okay, you can say it now.
That is because...
Your name is a bit shorter.
With Nora, you would be able to tell right away if you said her name fast.
But with Horo, you can say it in an instant!
The blood was going to your head, so you probably did not hear it.
What do you think?
I am just overflowing with persuasi-
Shut up!
You called my name just because it is a bit shorter?
You damn fool!
I am angry because you actually think that!
If you had said that you called out that girl's name...
I would have scratched you with all I had!
I will give you another chance.
Try saying my name now.
Horo.
Your name is better, after all.
Fool.
Ah, I know.
I have to clear the false accusations.
He did not fall for me.
He just realized my true self.
Is that so?
You have a good partner.
He is more useful than this one.
Damn you.
Be happy, you two.
